I never thought I would like a co-op game until I meet Left 4 Dead, your other 3 teammates try their best to protect you and will even revive and heal you. Aside from that the Zombie killing is on par with games such as that of House Of The Dead. Fallout 76 should been a Co-Op game stupid Bethesda. I love this game. I can't wait to try Left 4 Dead 2 that I got in the bundle. Get it while it's on sell, you won't regret it..
